passage_text: save symbicort is a new medication used to treat both copd and asthma symbicort works immediately and can relieve symptoms in as little as five minutes symbicort should be used in conjunction with a rescue inhaler as it is a long term maintenance medication and will not be effective when used as a rescue inhaler it is important to remember that asthma controller medicines should not be used to treat sudden symptoms

patients are often prescribed a combination drug such as symbicort after a single medication drug has failed to prevent or control asthma symptoms such as wheezing or difficulty breathing symbicort does not work immediately and is not intended for use as a rescue inhaler to relieve asthma attacks

symbicort budesonide and formoterol fumarate dihydrate is a combination of a steroid and a long acting bronchodilator used to prevent bronchospasm in people with asthma or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease copd

available by prescription only symbicort is a metered dose aerosol inhaler containing the medications budesonide and formoterol budesonide is a corticosteroid that works by reducing the irritation and swelling of the air passages formoterol a long acting beta agonist opens the air passages in the lungs to facilitate breathing
symbicort budesonide and formoterol is a prescription medication used to treat asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease copd including emphysema and chronic bronchitis
